title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 30 July 2008 - XWiki

newboy - (30/07/2008 12:42): hi guys, I have written some code which starts in a panel which searches through pages which are 'marked' with a particular object. It then makes a list of all section headings in those pages in a drop down box, and then directs the user to a page which shows all sections with that particular heading on one page    
newboy - (30/07/2008 12:42): would this code be useful for anyone else?

vmassol - (30/07/2008 12:56): newboy: feel free to add it as a code snippet on code.xwiki.org, thanks  
xwikibot - (30/07/2008 12:57): Drafts.WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki was modified by xwiki:XWiki.PaulIosifGuralivu - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki  
xwikibot - (30/07/2008 13:02): Drafts.WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki was modified by xwiki:XWiki.PaulIosifGuralivu - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki  
newboy - (30/07/2008 13:02): vmassol: I'm not sure it is ready for that. it works but to be honest it is very badly written. It uses a ridiculous method of creating the list. I have defined a number of independent variables to put each title in the list so that if there are more titles than variables it fails. see http://pastebin.com/d5ed57629 to see the silliness  
xwikibot - (30/07/2008 13:02): Drafts.WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki was modified by xwiki:XWiki.PaulIosifGuralivu - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki  
vmassol - (30/07/2008 13:03): ah yes I agree the code isn't nice :)  
xwikibot - (30/07/2008 13:03): Drafts.WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki was modified by xwiki:XWiki.PaulIosifGuralivu - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki  
newboy - (30/07/2008 13:04): vmassol: is there any way to create an array so that I can do it properly because I think it might actually be quite a useful bit of code if I made it better  
vmassol - (30/07/2008 13:05): newboy: http://velocity.apache.org/engine/devel/user-guide.html  
xwikibot - (30/07/2008 13:05): Drafts.WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki was modified by xwiki:XWiki.PaulIosifGuralivu - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki  
xwikibot - (30/07/2008 13:06): Drafts.WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki was modified by xwiki:XWiki.PaulIosifGuralivu - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki  
vmassol - (30/07/2008 13:07): newboy: you can also look at http://velocity.apache.org/tools/devel/javadoc/org/apache/velocity/tools/generic/ListTool.html it's available in xwiki as $listtool  
xwikibot - (30/07/2008 13:07): Drafts.WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki was modified by xwiki:XWiki.PaulIosifGuralivu - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WritingSeleniumsTestsForXWiki  
newboy - (30/07/2008 13:09): vmassol: aah, that is useful, I had a look at that before but couldn't figure out how to access it form xwiki  
newboy - (30/07/2008 13:12): vmassol: would you mind just writing one line fo code to give me an example as to how to use it in xwiki?  
vmassol - (30/07/2008 13:12): $listtool.size($primes)     
vmassol - (30/07/2008 13:13): you need XE 1.5 and above  
newboy - (30/07/2008 13:15): damn, I'm on 1.41
